revision.text:
A Department Store can be found in every region and are located in: *[[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]] - Does not stock [[File:Ultraball.png|25px]][[Ultraball|Ultraballs]], [[File:SmallRestore.png|25px]][[Small Restore|Small Restores]], [[File:MediumRestore.png|25px]][[Medium Restore|Medium Restores]], or [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]] *[[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] - Does not stock [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]] *[[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]] *[[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Veilstone City]] *[[Towns & Cities#Unova|Shopping Mall Nine]] *[[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] *[[Towns & Cities#Alola|Royal Avenue]]
The Department Store with its complete inventory as detailed below can be accessed in the Shortcuts module, alongside the [[File:Underground.png|20px]] [[Underground]] and [[File:Farm.png|20px]] [[Farm]], after defeating [[Gyms#Johto Indigo Plateau|Champion Lance]] in Johto.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
